content: The good news is there's a Shrine at the top of the last set of stairs, and you might be able to race upward and claim it, otherwise go all out in using all of your abilities -- like Pluck of Many -- to even the odds along with Transformations.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Inner Courtyard'.
The content is as follows:
The good news is there's a Shrine at the top of the last set of stairs, and you might be able to race upward and claim it, otherwise go all out in using all of your abilities -- like Pluck of Many -- to even the odds along with Transformations.
